actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill repealing subsection (d) of section 5343 of title 5, United States Code (commonly referred to as the Monroney amendment).

summary.text: Repeals the Monroney amendment which provides criteria for a survey of local industry by a lead agency to determine the prevailing local wages for the purpose of setting the wages of specified Federal employees.

titles.title: A bill repealing subsection (d) of section 5343 of title 5, United States Code (commonly referred to as the Monroney amendment).
